Huffman Codes, Post-Order Tree Traversals (both copied directly from the console) and File Sizes

case 1 - "a.txt"
	File size (before encoding)- 10
	File size (after encoding)- 1
	Traversal- a10
	Codes-
	a(0):

case 2 - "ab.txt"
	File size (before encoding)- 28
	File size (after encoding)- 4
	Traversal- a14b14@28
	Codes-
	a(1):   1
	b(1):   0

case 3 - "abc.txt"
	File size (before encoding)- 26
	File size (after encoding)- 6
	Traversal- a12b7c7@14@26
	Codes-
	a(1):   1
	b(2):   01
	c(2):   00
